All Classes

  • All Classes Interface Summary Class Summary Exception Summary 
    Class Description
    ApplicationException
    ApplicationException is a custom checked exception used to indicate application-level errors.
    BaseBean
    Parent class of all Beans in application.
    BaseCtl
    Base controller class of project.
    ChangePasswordCtl
    Controller to handle Change Password functionality.
    CollegeBean
    College JavaBean encapsulates College attributes
    CollegeCtl
    CollegeCtl Servlet Controller class to perform Add, Update, Delete and Get operations for College.
    CollegeListCtl
    CollegeListCtl servlet class to handle operations like searching, listing, deleting, and paginating College records.
    CollegeModel
    Model class for College entity that handles JDBC operations such as add, update, delete, find, and search on the st_college table.
    CourseBean
    Course JavaBean encapsulates Course attributes
    CourseCtl
    CourseCtl Servlet Controller.
    CourseListCtl
    Course List functionality Controller.
    CourseModel
    Model class for handling Course operations such as add, update, delete, find and search.
    DatabaseException
    DatabaseException is a custom checked exception used to indicate errors related to database operations.
    DataUtility
    Data Utility class to format data from one format to another
    DataValidator
    This class validates input data
    DropdownListBean
    DropdownList interface is implemented by Beans those are used to create drop down list on HTML pages
    DuplicateRecordException
    DuplicateRecordException is a custom checked exception used to indicate that a duplicate record exists when trying to add or update data.
    EmailBuilder
    Class that build Application Email messages
    EmailMessage
    Contains Email Message
    EmailUtility
    Email Utility provides Email Services
    ErrorCtl
    ErrorCtl servlet class to handle application errors.
    FacultyBean
    Faculty JavaBean encapsulates Faculty attributes
    FacultyCtl
    FacultyCtl controller to handle Faculty data operations.
    FacultyListCtl
    FacultyListCtl servlet controller to handle listing, searching, pagination, and deletion of Faculty records.
    FacultyModel
    Model class for Faculty entity.
    ForgetPasswordCtl
    ForgetPasswordCtl handles the "Forgot Password" functionality.
    FrontController
    FrontController filter acts as a security layer to intercept all incoming requests to protected resources (under `/doc/*` and `/ctl/*` URL patterns).
    GetMarksheetCtl
    Controller to Get Marksheet by Roll Number functionality.
    HTMLUtility
    HTML Utility class to produce HTML contents like Dropdown List.
    JDBCDataSource
    JDBCDataSource is a utility class that manages database connections using C3P0 connection pooling.
    LoginCtl
    Controller to handle Login and Logout functionality.
    MarksheetBean
    Marksheet JavaBean encapsulates Marksheet attributes
    MarksheetCtl
    Controller to handle operations related to Marksheet.
    MarksheetListCtl
    Controller to handle Marksheet List operations.
    MarksheetMeritListCtl
    Controller to display the Marksheet Merit List.
    MarksheetModel
    Model class for handling Marksheet operations like add, update, delete, and search.
    MyProfileCtl
    Controller to handle My Profile functionality of a user.
    ORSView
    Contains ORS View and Controller URI
    PropertyReader
    Read the property values from application properties file using Resource Bundle
    RecordNotFoundException
    RecordNotFoundException is a custom checked exception used to indicate that a requested record was not found in the data source.
    RoleBean
    Role JavaBean encapsulates Role attributes
    RoleCtl
    RoleCtl handles operations for adding and updating Role entities.
    RoleListCtl
    RoleListCtl handles the listing, searching, pagination, and deletion of Role records.
    RoleModel
    RoleModel handles all CRUD operations and search functionality for Role entities in the application.
    ServletUtility
    This class provides utility operation for Servlet container like forward, redirect, handle generic exception, manage success and error message, manage default Bean and List, manage pagination parameters
    StudentBean
    Student JavaBean encapsulates Student attributes
    StudentCtl
    Controller to handle Student add/update operations.
    StudentListCtl
    Student List Controller.
    StudentModel
    StudentModel handles database operations for Student records.
    SubjectBean
    Subject JavaBean encapsulates Subject attributes
    SubjectCtl
    Subject Controller.
    SubjectListCtl
    Subject List Controller.
    SubjectModel
    Model class for managing Subject entities in the database.

    TimetableBean
    Timetable JavaBean encapsulates Timetable attributes
    TimetableCtl
    Timetable Controller to handle timetable add, update, and preload data.
    TimetableListCtl
    Timetable List Controller to handle listing, searching, pagination, and deleting of timetable records.
    TimetableModel
    Model class for Timetable management.
    UserBean
    User JavaBean encapsulates User attributes
    UserCtl
    User Controller to handle adding, updating, validation and displaying User form.
    UserListCtl
    User List Controller to handle list, search, delete operations of User.
    UserModel
    UserModel handles all database operations related to User entity such as add, update, delete, find, authenticate, etc.
    UserRegistrationCtl
    UserRegistrationCtl is a servlet controller class to handle user registration.
    WelcomeCtl
    WelcomeCtl is a servlet controller class that forwards requests to the Welcome view.
